truth-or-dare-troubled-teens.question: What's something you've never told your parents?

What's the biggest lie you've ever told?

What's your biggest insecurity?

What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever had to explain to someone?

What’s your strangest dealbreaker?

How long was your longest relationship?
What secretly scares you?
Who would you want to help you bury a body?
What do you secretly worry people judge you for?
Who do you dislike the most in the room?
If you had to kiss one person in this room, who would it be?
What’s a lie you’ve told your best friend?
When and where was your first kiss? Who was it with? What was it like?
What's the meanest thing you've ever said to someone else?
Who was your worst kiss ever?

When was the last time you apologized? What for?
What's your biggest pet peeve about the person to your left?
Name one thing you'd change about every person in this room.
When was the last time you made someone else cry?
How many people have you kissed?
What's your most absurd dealbreaker?
If your best friend called you to bury a body would you do it?
Who in this room would be your one phone call if you were in jail?
Who's the last person you stalked on social media?
What's the worst advice you've ever given someone else?
What's the worst advice someone else has ever given you?
Would you volunteer as tribute for anyone in this room in The Hunger Games?
When was the last time you wanted to hit somebody?
When was the last time you were really angry? Why?
When was the last time you got rejected?
Have you ever seriously injured another person?
Who in this room do you trust the least?
Let someone go through your phone for one minute.
Send a voice message singing a song of the group’s choice to a random contact.
Show the room the browser history on your phone.
Read the first message in your conversations with your most recent contact.
Post an old, embarrassing photo of yourself on social media.
Let the group send a voice note to someone on your phone.
Call a random contact in your phone and sing Happy Birthday to them, regardless of their actual birthday.
Let someone else draw on your face with a pen or marker for 1 minute.
Send a message to your crush or partner with an embarrassing pickup line.
Let the group choose a random item for you to eat or drink from the kitchen.
Let someone draw a mustache on your face with a marker.
Let someone write a word on your arm, and you can’t explain it if anyone asks about it later.
Let someone send a text message from your phone without telling you what they wrote.
Call your crush or partner and pretend to be someone else.
Text your crush or partner and ask them out on a date in the most awkward way possible.
Let someone go through your phone and pick a random photo for you to explain.
Write a short poem about someone in the room and read it aloud.
Swap socks with someone for the next 2 rounds.
Text your crush.
Let another player post any photo they want to your Instagram story.
Give a kissing demonstration with a pillow.
Text someone lyrics to a song line by line.
Flirt with another player of the groups choosing for the next 3 rounds.
Lick a bar of soap.
Tell a lie at some point during the game (if no one realizes give out a punishment).
Try and make yourself cry in front of the group.
Insult everyone in the room.
Smell another player’s armpit.
Try to put your whole fist in your mouth.
Put your clothing on backwards for the next 5 rounds.
Do an impression of another player until someone can figure out who it is.
Pour ice down your pants.
Text your ex and say “I miss you.”
Try to do the splits.
Act out a proposal, choosing someone in the room as your partner.
Make a prank call.
Squat the person to your right.
Send a heart-eye emoji to your crush’s Instagram story.
Call a friend and tell them you have a huge crush on them.
Wear your clothes backward for the rest of the game.
Kiss someone on the cheek in the room.
Sit on someone’s lap for the next 2 rounds.
Call your crush and say nothing for 10 seconds, then hang up.
Let someone send a random emoji to your last text conversation.
Let someone paint your nails with whatever they find.
Text your partner or crush and ask them what their favorite vegetable is.
Take an item out of the refrigerator and passionately kiss it.
Let someone in the group describe your most attractive feature in detail.
Call your crush or partner and say something flirty but keep it mysterious.
Let someone give you a chinese burn.
Comment “heart eye emojis” under your crush's latest post.
